welcome: Hey, thanks for hosting Trivia. I'd be happy to help you adminster today's questions. Here's how I work:
help: To ask questions use the command `/ask *(2 pt)* In 1992, This team won the NBA finals. A repeat before they came back to complete the threepeat in 1993.`
To award points, use the command `/award @Person <int:points>`
If you've upset the team (tough crowd, I know) and they convice you to accept a different answer, subtract points by using the award command with a negative number of points.
